Collaborative Music Lab
Contact Members

The collaborative music lab focuses on creating shared musical experiences through the creation of new software and hardware instruments. In particular, we are interested in:

  • Instrument design as creative process
  • Musical knowledge and aesthetics embedded in musical instruments
  • How musical practice using music technology creates cultural impact
  • How people make electronic music together
  • Future practices of making electronic music in ensemble

The CML is directed by Ian Hattwick.

Live Coding Performance Practice
